content: Thank God. "http://www.cnn.com/2009/WORLD/meast/05/11/iran.us.journalist/index.html" If I was this woman, or any one else for that matter, I would RUN out of this country and never go back. I wish people would learn that if your not an Iranian Citizen, specially Americans, YOU ARE A TARGET no matter what your job is. Stay out of there.

title: U.S. journalist freed in Iran, attorney says

content: Her sentence was reduced to 8 years probation. I think that the Iranians knew that the charges and conviction of Ms. Saberi were trumped up. So they saved face by releasing her but not admiting that she is innocent.
